caption.title: Identification of rotavirus A VP4 gene segment by using VP4 1-17F and Con2 primers.
caption.p: Lane 1: DNA ladder 50 bp, lane 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8: Amplified product of gene segment VP4 (876 bp size) of samples no 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 16, Lane7: Samples number 13 negative for VP4 gene, Lane 9, 10 and 11: Positive control, Negative control and non-target control (NT-C), respectively.
Click here for additional data file.
